body: [This line](https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/blob/ecfaa6563f168ea023e3ee83abf52f7d6ca552a8/mocks/NamespaceClient.go#L80) is missing the `request` argument to the `Update` function. This means that there is _always_ a mismatch in arguments when attempting to use this mock to return values.
title: Bad Update mock in NamespaceClient breaks mocking calls to this function
